short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjectivise Donald Trump - add adjectives to mentions of Donald Trump on a web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I give you:
"Donald Trump: Adject Failure"
Why? Because why not. Why not make stories involving the president more interesting? Why not add adjectives to as many mentions as you can? Why not add a little humor to the depressing news cycle?
Donations always welcome in the Options, donations of suggested adjectives to the support address and I'll see if they're suitable to be added - clean but pointed please, no swearing, no libel. Unless it's funny...
